install.name: Paypal Pro Payments
install.author: RedTeam
install.description: This plugin enables standard Paypal Pro payments

param.name: api_username
param.label: API account name:
param.description: This is your API username. (This will differ between Sandbox and Live)

param.name: api_password
param.label: API password:
param.description: This is your API password. (This will differ between Sandbox and Live)

param.name: api_signature
param.label: API Signature:
param.description: This is the API signature generated for you. (This will differ between Sandbox and Live)

param.name: paypal_email_address
param.label: Paypal Email Address:
param.description: This is your PayPal email address. (This will differ between Sandbox and Live)

param.name: sales_auth_only
param.label: Sale or Authorize Only:
param.description: Do you want to send the final sales info to paypal or just authorize the card and return to the site to be processed later?

param.name: verify_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Order Status for successful transactions
param.description: Select the order status to which the actual order is set, if the payment transaction was successful.

param.name: invalid_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Order Status for failed transactions
param.description: Select an order status for failed payment transactions.

param.name: capture_status
param.query: SELECT order_status_code AS st_value, order_status_name AS st_title FROM #__redshop_order_status
param.label: Capture Payment Status
param.description: Select an capture status for capturing payment.

param.name: economic_design_layout
param.label: Enter E-conomic Design and Layout ID
